name: Social Sharing 9
author: Theo Platica

sections.description:
Social Sharing 9 is a customizable WordPress plugin that enables you to display social sharing icons in different places on your website.

It enables an admin page where you can select all your options, choose what social networks you’ll activate, choose sizes, colors ad even order them as you wish.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/social-sharing-9 directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Social Sharing 9 screen to configure the plugin’s options
sections.faq:
Why isn’t the Whatsapp button being displayed?

The Whatsapp button is being displayed only on tablets and mobile devices.

Can I get help with editing the plugin for my custom project?

Yes, you can get in touch with the plugin’s author and go from there.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the First Version of Social Sharing 9 plugin.

short_description: This is a customizable Social Sharing plugin for WordPress.
description:
Social Sharing 9 is a customizable WordPress plugin that enables you to display social sharing icons in different places on your website.

It enables an admin page where you can select all your options, choose what social networks you’ll activate, choose sizes, colors ad even order them as you wish.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1:
• This version comes with structural improvements.
  • Google + has been removed since it's been discontinued by Google.
  • The plugin has been simplified in terms of placement options. Even so, a new placement option has been added: Floating on the Right Side.

screenshots.caption: In this screenshot, you can see the customizable options that the plugin has.
